price: Wancan! Kuma wanda ya rãma azãba da misãlin abin da aka yi masa, sa'an nan kuma aka zãlunce shi, lalle ne Allah Yanã taimakon sa. Lalle ne Allah haƙĩƙa Mai yãfẽwa ne, Mai gãfara.
arabic: ۞ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَنۡ عَاقَبَ بِمِثۡلِ مَا عُوقِبَ بِهِۦ ثُمَّ بُغِيَ عَلَيۡهِ لَيَنصُرَنَّهُ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٞ

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
